Government Tender Announcement

This public tender announcement solicits proposals for professional services from Programmer/Software Developers to provide expert development and coding services in support of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission's (CNSC) regulatory activities.

Project Description

The CNSC requires experienced software engineers to deliver services based on a CNSC-supplied specification, utilizing microservices/event patterns and Azure platform services. The work involves implementing a component-based solution to enable regulatory operations.

Deliverables

  • Implementation of a component-based solution to support regulatory operations
  • Delivery of high-quality professional development and coding services
  • Collaboration with the CNSC's Information Management and Technology Directorate (IMTD) team

Selection Criteria

The CNSC will evaluate proposals based on a combination of technical merit and price, with the highest combined rating determining the successful proponent.

Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following international trade agreements:

  • Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  • Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  • Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
  • Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  • Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
  • Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
  • Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
  • Canadian Free Trade Agreement
  • World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
  • Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
